issue.title: XML and PDF are not stored
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Metadata's XML and PDF are not stored, nor transmitted in GetOrders XML response.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

(Is not related to #1066)

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Identifiers were not passed, and files where stores using php's temp filenames.
Rev. 8937
